General.Name: Northking Information Technology Co
General.Description: Northking Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides information technology outsourcing (ITO) and business process outsourcing (BPO) services to financial institutions in China and internationally. The company offers telephone customer service, business acceptance and support, telephone return visits, complaint handling, commodity marketing, file data processing, background data processing, cash business, lobby assistant business, financial sharing services, and other services. It also provides software and hardware technical support, equipment installation, IT room monitoring, desktop operation and maintenance, requirements analysis, system design, program coding, system testing, and project management services. The company is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 25 West Third Ring Road, Beijing, China, 100081
